Sequence Information.Peptide Name: MCdef (Manila clams defensin; UCSS1a; 4S=S, natural AMPs; mollusca/molluscs/mollusks, marine invertebrates, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: adductor, foot, gill, hemocyte, mantle, palp, and siphon; Manila clams,Ruditapes philippinarum

Literature Information.Literature: Calculated mass 4968.709; chemical formula C205H321N63O64S8; molar extinction coefficient of the peptide 6460; The Wimley-White whole-residue hydrophobicity FOR DISULFIDE-LINKED PEPTIDE 5.73 kcal/mol. Similar to AOD (AP1468). MCdef is active against S. iniae KCTC 3651, S. aureus KCTC 1916 (MIC 1.25-2.5 uM), V. logei KCCM 12281, and V. salmonicida KCCM 41663 (MIC 10-20 uM).
Literature Information.Author: Adhya M, Jeung HD, Kang HS, Choi KS, Lee DS, Cho M.2012
Literature Information.Reference: Comp Biochem Physiol B Biochem Mol Biol. 2012 Jan;161(1):25-31.Pub-Med.
Literature Information.Title: Cloning and localization of MCdef, a defensin from Manila clams (Ruditapes philippinarum).
